articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Fires rage across southern Europe, forcing hundreds to evacuate - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: This year’s fire season has been significantly more destructive than previously, according to EU data.
articles.content: DOZENS OF VILLAGES were evacuated in tourist hotspots in southern Turkey on Sunday as wildfires that have claimed six lives raged for the fifth day, while Greece, Italy and Spain were also hit by bla… [+4006 chars]
